users.name: Strawberry
ingredient: ¼ cup heavy cream (optional for extra richness)
process: 1. Blend the strawberries – Puree the strawberries in a blender until smooth. If you prefer a smoother custard, strain the puree to remove seeds.
2. Temper the eggs – Gradually pour some of the warm milk into the egg mixture, whisking continuously to prevent curdling.
3. Finish and chill – Remove from heat, stir in vanilla extract and heavy cream (if using). Transfer to serving bowls and refrigerate for at least 2 hours

users.name: Fluffy Banana Pancakes
process: 1. In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt.
2. Heat a pan over medium heat, grease lightly, and pour small amounts of batter.
3. Serve with honey, maple syrup, or fresh fruit.

users.name: Avocado & Egg Toast
process: 1. Toast the bread until golden and crispy.
2.Cook eggs to your preference (fried, poached, or scrambled).
3. Sprinkle with chili flakes or seasoning for extra flavor.

users.name: Grilled Lemon Herb Salmon with Garlic Butter Asparagus
process: 1. Prepare the salmon marinade – In a bowl, mix olive oil, melted butter, minced garlic, thyme, rosemary, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
2. Marinate the salmon – Brush the marinade over the salmon fillets and let them sit for 10–15 minutes.
3. Serve – Plate the grilled salmon alongside the garlic butter asparagus. Garnish with extra lemon slices and fresh herbs.

users.name: Filet Mignon with Red Wine Reduction
process: 1. Cook rice
2. Stir-fry vegetables
3. Add rice and soy sauce
4. Mix well

users.name: Truffle Parmesan Popcorn
process: 1. Pop the popcorn using an air popper or stovetop method.
2. Sprinkle with Parmesan, salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Toss again to coat evenly.
3. Garnish with fresh parsley and serve warm

users.name: Lobster Risotto
process: 1. Sauté onion and garlic in butter until soft.
2. Add broth gradually, stirring continuously until rice is creamy and tende
3. Garnish with parsley and serve warm.

users.name: Truffle Mushroom & Burrata Pizza
ingredient: 1 cup mixed mushrooms (shiitake, cremini, oyster – sliced)
process: 1. Heat butter in a pan and sauté mushrooms with garlic until golden brown. Season with salt and pepper
2. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and crispy.
3. Drizzle with extra truffle oil before serving.

users.name: Prosciutto, Fig & Gorgonzola Pizza
process: 1. Spread a thin layer of fig jam over the dough.
2. Bake for 10-12 minutes until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden.
3. Garnish with fresh arugula and finish with a light crack of black pepper before serving.

users.name: Wild Mushroom & Goat Cheese Pappardelle
ingredient: 1 cup mixed wild mushrooms (shiitake, cremini, oyster)
process: 1. Cook pasta until al dente. Reserve ½ cup pasta water.
2. Add garlic, cook for 30 seconds, then deglaze with white wine. Reduce by half.
3. Toss in pasta, using reserved pasta water to adjust sauce.

users.name: Saffron & Shrimp Linguine
process: 1.Cook linguine until al dente, reserving ½ cup pasta water.
2. Deglaze the pan with white wine and reduce by half.
3. Finish with lemon zest, salt, and fresh basil.

users.name: Brie & Fig Crostini
process: 1. Arrange baguette slices on a baking sheet and toast for 5 minutes.
2. Sprinkle with walnuts, drizzle with honey, and garnish with fresh thyme before serving.

users.name: Smoked Salmon & Avocado Bites
process: 1. In a bowl, mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
2. Spread a little cream cheese (if using) on each cucumber slice or cracker.
3. Garnish with fresh dill and serve immediately.
